titles: Poor Robin's dream; commonly called, Poor charity. I know no reason, but this harmless riddle, may as well be printed, as sung to a fiddle. To a compleat tune, well known by musicians, and many others: or, Game at cards.
publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London.,
notes: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: British Library; University of Glasgow Library.
